text: "Tinseltown in the Rain" is a 1984 song by Scottish band The Blue Nile and is the second single from their debut studio album A Walk Across the Rooftops. It went to number 87 in the United Kingdom and number 28 in the Netherlands. It was covered by Andrea Corr in 2011. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Sophisti-pop songs
title: Tinseltown in the Rain
